question: ARC ratings is a joint initiative between which of the following?
option1: Sociedade de Avaliacao Estrategica e Risco,Lda of Portugal
option2: Credit Analysis and Research Limited (CARE) of India
option3: Global Credit Rating Company Limited (GCR) of South Africa
explanation: ARC Ratings is an international credit rating agency, with headquarters in Lisbon.ARC Ratings was originally founded in 1988. It is a joint venture between the Sociedade de Avaliacao Estrategica e Risco, Lda of Portugal, the Credit Analysis and Research Limited (CARE) of India, the Global Credit Rating Company Limited (GCR) of South Africa, the Malaysian Rating Corporation Berhad (MARC) of Malaysia and the SR Rating Group of Brazil.
